biocontainers.name: dnaclust
biocontainers.summary: Tool for clustering millions of short dna sequences

biotools.summary: DNACLUST is a tool for clustering millions of short DNA sequences. The clusters are created in such a way that the “radius” of each clusters is no more than the specified threshold.

bioschemas.name: DNACLUST
bioschemas.summary: DNACLUST is a tool for clustering millions of short DNA sequences. The clusters are created in such a way that the “radius” of each clusters is no more than the specified threshold.
